To make sure that the program doesn't automatically update ever:
1. Open "c:\WINDOWS\system32\drivers\etc\hosts" in notepad with administrative privileges.

2. Type "127.0.0.1 www.internetdownloadmanager.com" without quotes after the line "#	127.0.0.1  localhost".

3. Save the file.

4. Now even if u try updating the program manually. it will Give an error.. Tada!! :)

By the way, Happy New year everyone!!
